p: Stem cell mobilization and collection was performed as described previously 4. In short, stem cells were mobilized by daily subcutaneous injections of G‚ÄêCSF (10 mcg/kg daily, 5 days). Peripheral blood stem cells were collected with Amicus Separator System (Fenwal Inc., Lake Zurich, IL, http://www.fresenius-kabi.com), and the magnetic cell separator Clinimacs (Miltenyi Biotec, Germany, http://www.miltenyibiotec.com) was used for the imunomagnetic positive selection of CD34 + cells. Of the recovered CD34 + cells, 80 million were used for transendocardial injection.
